channel.title: Help
channel.description:
hey, the other day, i was in my server and the owner of moparscape came into my server. i didnt really pay attention cuz i had to leave but then later a person came in saying that he was mopar and that i banned his admin account.....and i didnt. is this an impersonator? like sometimes he threatens to shut down my server and he hangs in my server a lil too much. should I just ban him?
like he even recited a sentence that i said to the owner i said "how the hell do you have maxed and a crown!?!" lol and he receited that to me but i think he was ther when the owner was so he took advanatge of it...

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Cozmo891 Cozmo891
item.description:
@Cozmo891 wrote:

What?
[br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2006, 10:07:59 PM[/size][hr]ok, i asked him whre he lives and he said new jersey…and the owner of moparscape lives in ohio

how do you ban someones ip so they can make a new account on my server?

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @hamster40 hamster40
item.description:
@hamster40 wrote:

lol stickies are the commandments of the mopar gods, and what if it was your friend playin a prank?

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @hamster40 hamster40
item.description:
@hamster40 wrote:

hey buddy and any newb that asks help type:
Problem: The problem you are experiencing

Server Base: Your server Base the problem is on
:otherwise u wont get any help cuz u didnt read stickies!

Read full topic
